website_summaries.verdict: A highly impressive soundbar created by Bose that offers spacious, clear sound. Voice or app controlled.
pros: Newer model of high-quality Bose soundbar featuring voice assistants
Control via remote, app, or voice
Integrated audio apps include Spotify and Audible
cons: Compatible high-end subwoofer and surround speakers sold separately

customer_reviews.title: A new app for a new system, what happened to whole house music from Bose?
customer_reviews.text: I have several SoundTouch speakers around the house. I was looking forward to expanding the wireless speaker system using the SoundBar 700. Unfortunately this speaker uses a different Bose Music app and cannot be paired with existing wireless SoundTouch speakers. For those of us that have been investing in Bose, this is a big fail. I simply want a whole house audio system that is wireless. Not possible from Bose anymore. I'll be returning this unit and changing brands.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M Tidwell

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great.  Remote and app need work.
customer_reviews.text: I’m very impressed with the sound quality of this soundbar with the subwoofer. My other surround system is a 5.1 Bose Acoustimass 7 system. The sound field is wide enough that sounds off to the sides have fooled the dog. The app connects unreliable though so I’ll rarely use it. The remote was difficult to set up too, and still isn’t controlling TV functions reliably.
customer_reviews.author: W. Warren

customer_reviews.title: App is a real pain update - Connectivity to Alexa is -10 stars
customer_reviews.text: Very underwhelming ! App has become a real pain , always needing to log out and back in , sound quality is Good but I expected more. I’d give the App a 0 rating 20th february - still the same no one has been able to sort the problems , Alexa and Bose do not get on at all!! Good sound at but connectivity to Alexa gets a -10 from me
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY BOSE 700
customer_reviews.text: Hello Guys, Please don’t buy the Bose sound bar 700 if you have Samsung TV. It doesn’t support the Samsung TV HDMI port. I just missed the return date and not helpless and Bose won’t support at all. They will tell you to contact Samsung and ask for support Really disappointed with the Bose company. Hope you make right choice
customer_reviews.author: Amit Panchal

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Sounds awesome but the setup is super tricky and time consuming. It is not compatible with Alexa nor can you download new apps like Disney+. It also seems to not hold any settings and the romote sucks!!! You have to push buttons multiple times and you can't feel the buttons. Total waste of ALOT of money in my opinion. And tec support was less than impressive, offered no help but to restart and try again. Don't waste your time. For $800 you could get a system that is way less stressful.
customer_reviews.author: Jesika G.

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to set up. The app is garbage. It constantly logs me out and will not reconnect. Spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D.

customer_reviews.title: Won't work
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the other reviewers. I've always wanted a Bose sound system. I am so disappointed that the reviews are true: the Bose app is crap, the sound bar is stuck on some kind of update, customer service is closed. Don't buy this unless you love frustration and wasting ALOT of money.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Holden

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: Bose came out with a firmware update that causes the remote to double move when attempting to navigate making the remote unusable. Bose will not offer a firmware rollback option and is not concerned that they broke their own product since they already have your money. I suggest going with a brand that is more concerned about their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Primagen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome soundbar BOSE at its best.
customer_reviews.text: The sound on this soundbar is ridiculous!! Bose doesn’t hold back on quality of sound! Definitely a must have in a living room setting!! Awesome even without the bass module and small speakers. Remote control is less than desirable doesn’t work with the new Verizon Arris boxes but it’s really nice looking. And the app took a little time to connect to my IPhone which was nagging the crap out of me. But once I got it to connect it was easy to set up the process and connecting to my Apple Music and other apps was a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Deric Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Good system
customer_reviews.text: Works great! We chose this to “downsize” from our AV receiver set up. We use ours for music, gaming, TV and movies. Smaller footprint, wireless and sounds great. Set up instructions need work, although the Bose app isn’t bad; it could use a few more pointers for the first-time user. I’m an MS EE and figured it out, but understand why some had issues. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Conner

customer_reviews.title: Does not connect
customer_reviews.text: Product does not connect to remote. Sound quality is low. Full internet connectivity is required to use even the most basic functions
customer_reviews.author: David Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good luck with getting the app to work 100%  off ùof the time!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the complete Bose 700 series surround package. The sad part is, it sounded sweet but the down side is. it runs thru the Bose's app 100% if the app has issues like it does your system is a 2500 paper weight. My first system would not stay fully connected. So I exchanged it for a new one but I didn't want to take the risk if the same thing happening. So I bought much cheaper system. It doesn't come close in sound but neither did the price. I hope in the future. Bose makes the app an option not a major part of the system....
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Cool tech needed more testing
customer_reviews.text: This product is so confusing. Half the time I cant get it to work properly when I turn it on. There isnt actually a way to tell how loud it is you just have to keep turning it up or down and figure it out, it's also quite difficult to tell if it's on or not. That being said, when it works it's awesome! Super cool piece of tech, the alexa does not work for anything but it's pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: Beau Ryan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional for non-dolby atmos
customer_reviews.text: Very crisp sounds, I purchased this soundbar with the bass module and rear speakers, so I can't really give accurate review as a standalone. The remote design idea is cool at first, because everytime you pick it up all the buttons light up. But now it's just annoying that u have to shake it or move it to light up so u can press a button. Alexa is sometimes buggy but then again even Amazon products are too. Tech support is very good though. It doesn't support dolby atmos, I only purchased it because it has a white color variant and the size is exactly what I was looking for. Compared to the sonos soundbar this one is way better.
customer_reviews.author: MrsLee

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money... there's better for less.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is okay but not great. There's soundbars out there that sound just as good if not better for less. Also,, the bar will just stop producing sound for no reason. I then have to get the remote and try to figure out why the sound is coming out of the tv and not the bar. I usually learn that the bar has turned of or power cycled itself or something. It's just annoying. Also, when pairing with a Bose Revolver+, you'd think that would be flawless. Nope... it constantly gets out of sync making music sound ridiculous. I expected so much more from Bose. I always thought they were top notch... they are not.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Wood

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sound and design, PIA remote.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is excellent and from an aesthetic’s stand point, the design is sleek and beautiful. Compliments my LG OLED TV nicely and fits my mantle without crowding it. The remote is beautiful and set up appears easy, but I really struggled to get it to sync with my TV. None of the codes works and when asked for the model, I had to google how to add the the model number correctly. Could not get it to sync with cable box yet either. Also, getting TV to output sound to the box only will require finding your manual. I have to use 3 remotes right now to operate everything but very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: A. Dorman

customer_reviews.title: Needs Back Up to instructions for use!! Should not require app
customer_reviews.text: After 3 weeks I still have not listened to my speaker! Absolutely ridiculous idea that you have to download the app in order to use your speaker. I had an issue with 2 factor authentication and could not dowload the app- worked with Apple for almost 3 weeks trying to correct the issues- meantime I cannot install my Bose bar!!! Frustrated beyond belief ! Also the remote is all black - one instruction said find the setting button on your remote - how?? You can’t see the words???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound but troubles with Wifi
customer_reviews.text: I purchased complete set. The sound quality is good. It looks cool. However each time you turn on your Apple tv, you have to go to the settings to reconnect the system. Very annoying. If you planning to purchase subwoofer and rear speakers here is my scale of sound level. Let's say with full set it's 10, without rear speakers it's 9 and without sub, 7.5 Think twice if you want to spend that extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Maksym

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: This would not hook up to our tv. My husband is an electrician and he struggled for a week trying to get this sound bar to work. We even bought new routers thinking that was the problem. Nope. It was very frustrating. It took almost 4 weeks to get a credit upon return. Very odd.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install and sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a 52 year old female and this sound bar was super easy to install and Sounds great! This product got me hooked on Alexa as well. The sound is incredible!
customer_reviews.author: Abbyhun

customer_reviews.title: Easily replaces wired systems. Phenomenal sound!
customer_reviews.text: The Bose 700 Soundbar and the accompanying Bass and surround provide the means to unshackle yourself from the wired prison - running speaker wire through walls, drilling holes, snaking it up to the module. I went from a Bose V30 to the wireless Soundbar 700, bass and surround speakers. The sound quality is comparable enough that I may never get a 5.1 system again. Alexa integration, I’ll reserve judgement as I haven’t availed myself to it yet. Setup was easy. The app works fine. Well-worth the money. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Just do it
customer_reviews.text: Very good product. Bose just does it right with simple set up and instructions. You know what I mean, sometimes it’s just too much just to sync up different devices all together. You want it simple, to the point. They’ve done it with this product and the sound quality is impressive. If you’re on the fence, take the plunge. I’m glad I did I’m confident you will be too.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Soundbar is great! Remote is meh.
customer_reviews.text: Overall the soundbar is great! I read all the reviews and it seems that people expecting this to be simply plugging it and expecting it to work really don’t understand the point of purchasing the soundbar. The setup was simple, but you do need to follow the directions step by step. The remote would be great if it had a page up and down feature. It doesn’t, so I’m still using the crappy cable box remote for most things.
customer_reviews.author: 17kb

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy any his product
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t reconnect. And remote control seems like not the real one, very hard to find keys on the remote .. don’t buy if
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Alexa intregration is cool but not the best. More annoying than anything. It’ll blink a white light and not play anything, but I haven’t looked into how to clear that in case it’s a notification. Clarity is great and the sound overall is excellent and my room is pretty open. The remote is fantastic. I’ve programmed all of my electronics to it. The only one it couldn’t connect to was my Xbox.
customer_reviews.author: R McHugh

customer_reviews.title: Check it as soon as you get it!
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was a BRAND NEW product, but when I opened the box, it had finger prints on it and the glass on top of the bar came chipped. Not sure if it’s Bose or Amazon’s fault, but when you’re spending money on something, you don’t expect it to come defective RIGHT out of the box. Returned and going to Best Buy.
customer_reviews.author: Eliyaim Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and speakers, terrible interface
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, but the remote and interface is a mess. Can not turn off bluetooth or wifi, the remote changes buttons and goes dark, impossible to know what state the options are in. Connection intermittently works. Bose should make a great sound system with some switches and cable connections, stop trying to get people to use your complicated systems in an attempt to be a music media company...no one wants to use your music app. Conclusion: great sound and speakers, terrible interface.
customer_reviews.author: Gus Wyoming

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Amazing But isn’t the Best Soundbar with its limited options.
customer_reviews.text: Limited Options in Real Life Usage. Didn’t work with my computer through optical connection. Limited Input options and airplay option is non existent.
customer_reviews.author: torandez novakhova

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy Bose
customer_reviews.text: 13 months after purchase my $1600 sound bar and bass speaker are useless. The sound bar has no sound coming out. The sounbar is dead so the bass and surround speakers are useless. Did I say $1600. No phone tech support they send you to a website. You think you are buying the best. Screwed again.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Berger

customer_reviews.title: True movie theater experience!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely incredible sound! True movie theater experience! Takes a little experimentation with the settings but what worked for me was 0 treble 20 middle and 80 bass! First soundbar I’ve owned so I can not compare to other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Sound!!!
customer_reviews.text: The Sound Bar itself it’s amazing, the sound it’s great, the remote control, works flawlessly with the sound bar, now if you pair it with the TV or any other device, it’s confusing since you have to adapt to certain button names that will do what the original remote would do, DONT get me wrong the Bose remote works perfect and it looks amazing but you will see what I mean when you try to change channels of Roku or Apple TV, if you will remain using the original remote from those devices then you’ll be 100% fine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Bose. More than sound, a lifestyle.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the bar along with the bass module, then added the 700 speakers. Bose has a distinct sound: clean, clear, neutral. This full surround system sounds great with dvds and streaming Amazon Prime. Even better listening to music. The cherry on top is the look. Everything has the glass black tops. Clean, understated and very classy. Expensive? Yes, but given the build and quality I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: cone gobbler

customer_reviews.title: Not working at all.
customer_reviews.text: No sound from the speaker. Remote not working. Returned the product and waiting for the replacement and hope it works. When are you sending the replacement?
customer_reviews.author: PRABHAKAR K SHETTY

customer_reviews.title: Limits with application
customer_reviews.text: Upon initial set up with system, it configures itself. This is great, except that any customization is not available or non-intuitive. I now have yet another "universal" remote control, which is neither universal nor able to provide significant remote control of my AV system. On-line assistance points to the application. Which does not allow customization or modification off the set-up configuration.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sound bar, and has the option to make it part of a unbelievable home theater system. Being a musician, when I streamed music whether from YouTube or Pandora, the sound that came through was an eye opener. Great clarity and balance, but just lacking that little extra level of low-mid tones, and low tones. Great for movies and overall well worth the money for the ease of set up and, amount of set up.
customer_reviews.author: James J Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This is a game changer in our media room. Sound is incredible. Alexa response is awesome. I have also fit this system with the sub and sats. I say go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Vogt

customer_reviews.title: Completely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Powerful, clear, easy to set up along with add on sub and surround speakers. It really finds ways to make the sound stage feel wider than you would expect from a sound bar. It's weird but it often sounds like there are speakers off to the left and right of the sound bar. As I was researching and listened to other spundbars nothing sounded as good as this with the Atmos spundbars not being up to par yet.
customer_reviews.author: Eric A.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great but major software issues
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sounding bar, but Bose has taken many shortcuts. It’s Alexa does not function like a normal Alexa. You can’t adjust settings in the Alexa app, you can’t change the wake word, it can’t join other echo devices in a speaker group. Also the remote is does not work well. Buttons are hard to push and the backlight turns off too quickly and that also cannot be adjusted. Thinking that maybe I should switch to a Sonos system.
customer_reviews.author: JDN 1757

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, looks great
customer_reviews.text: This soundbar looks great and has great full sound. I would recommend getting the Bass Module 500 to go with it. I have not heard the 700 but I feel like any more bass would muffle the Soundbar it self. The remote is horrible and I still can't get it to work with my TV but I wanted to use my TV remote primarily anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but good!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome unit and a must have to pair with the 700 bass unit that adds sounds that aren't normally heard during movies. The only cons that I can think of is the glass top that's impossible to keep clean and the lack of increments on the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Maikoski

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound. BOSE
customer_reviews.text: All was as expected. Some aspect for the configuration are easy but other not like the aincronization with other devices and alexa and spotify. Youtube not allowed for the price that is something bad.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Guaqueta

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works great!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a bit hard to tell when Alexa is listening, and Alex cant do some things like turn the Fire TV in through the Bose bar... plus it doesn’t seem to join other Echos and Dots in the house to play the same music room-to-room.
customer_reviews.author: cody dennison

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound. I feel like my TV got new life just by adding this speaker. The sound is reach and clear. The speaker is very well built and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Overrated speakers and sound bar
customer_reviews.text: The sound is underwhelming for this price tag and please don’t buy the surrounding speakers. I have to put my ears close to them to hear anything. I turned the volume to 100 on the app but it doesn’t change much, such waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Zhaoting Wu

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect it to link up with hard wired components.
customer_reviews.text: The stand alone sound quality of this unit is mediocre, at best. There is no provision for wiring in existing speakers, unless they're blue tooth. My whole house is hard wired with older Bose speakers, which remain awesome. I bought this thinking it would "talk" to my older Bose Acoustimass systems; alas, I have to purchase new wireless models if I want that fabulous sound. So, I bagged it. I had it all hooked up but tore it down and gave it to a good friend to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Doctor Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, sounds great. Made my regular sounding TV sound like a home theater 🎥. A little on the pricey side but once I did my research and heard it a few times I knew what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Rey Rey

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gaming and watching game of thrones
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth it easy to use and very powerful bass also very nice looking. I’ll be playing modern warfare and man it feels like I’m shooting the real thing very nice and crisp audio
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: Still troubleshooting this after many weeks
customer_reviews.text: Hard to set up, audio cuts in and out, functionality comes and goes, pretty frustrated so far. it does sound good, but damn this thing is inconsistent. Horrible, I want my $ back. HDMI won’t work
customer_reviews.author: johnathan

customer_reviews.title: It’s premium sound quality
customer_reviews.text: It’s great sound with great sound quality I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Abdurahman A.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied wit this product.
customer_reviews.text: This makes my family room sound like a movie theater. Very clean sound and works with my Amazon Music.
customer_reviews.author: D. Stenberg

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The bar is extremely long and for the most expensive one I have bought the sound quality is the worst. The Alexa piece works great.
customer_reviews.author: Meghann

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and design! However, the Alexa integration is really bad. It can only do basic stuff like “volume up” or “Tv on”. Most other Alexa functions are not comparable. The Soundbar it’s self is great, the sound is amazing, especially when paired with rear speakers and Subwoofer.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Worst Bose product ever
customer_reviews.text: Worst Bose product ever. Remote is worthless and syncing nearly impossible. Sound is irrelevant if you can’t use it. .
customer_reviews.author: David Dworkin

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband and it’s great. Makes a big difference in the sound quality coming from the tv.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work properly
customer_reviews.text: The speaker would not go through its set up -- tried many times(even with Bose tech support) and gave up. The remote sucks cant see the face of remote (only lights up when it decides that portion of remote is necessary)just stupid design --
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound, amazing quality!!!
customer_reviews.text: 100% satisfaction from the Sound, especially after learning how to adjust the balance between front, back and the sub.
customer_reviews.author: Avi dori

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. HDMI ARC isn’t working. Premium price for bad product
customer_reviews.text: HDMI ARC stopped working. Spent hours trying to fix it to no avail. Bose isn’t what it used to be. Avoid!!
customer_reviews.author: Winnie the Pooh

customer_reviews.title: The best sound bar you can buy
customer_reviews.text: The sound is Amazing, even in a small room or large Bose had done an Amazing job once again.
customer_reviews.author: Mark smith

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING. YES. BUY.
customer_reviews.text: Yesss! You have to get this, and please get it with the Bose wireless subwoofer. AMAZING.
customer_reviews.author: Kanita

customer_reviews.title: Good sound for a soundbar. Still a soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Very good sound for a sound bar. I had the bass module and the surrounds and it sounded good but it sizzled a little in the mids. Very convenient to use but limited. For the same money $1900 I was able to get a real receiver and speakers. But if you want a sleek invisible little powerhouse this is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tierno

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sound is the most amazing I’ve heard, I haven’t got all the speakers connected yet, but sound bar is awesome alone, expensive investment but worth it!!! My television deserves sound like this!!
customer_reviews.author: RedRobyn

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: If there is one product that has never ever let me down it has been the Bose speakers. I have used them for over 10 years now and all my purchases have been the best value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds amazing. Even has bass by itself. It takes a long time to get started though. The sound quality is phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: No Base
customer_reviews.text: You have to install a Bose app on your phone so the remote is useless. The bar is just an extension of your TV speaker, there is no Base.
customer_reviews.author: Should have read more reviews

customer_reviews.title: What more can be said its BOSE
customer_reviews.text: Great sound bar, the universal remote well not so much I am glad i got it free because it does not always work with me Samsung Q8 65" TV.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Best sound bar out there. Couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is excellent, easy set up and expandable when we’re ready. Alexa compatible as well! You won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: BirdieByTheBay

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: The setup took a little longer than normal, but was worth it. The sound is great!
customer_reviews.author: Public Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great remote.
customer_reviews.text: The remote control does a great job as an universal remote. Directions on how to set up and use the sound bar and remote are woefully inadequate.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Folsom

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this sound bar
customer_reviews.text: We picked because of the brand. Never able to get it connected to our smart phone. Only works if you have a smart phone. Spent 5 hours trying to connect it. No directions included Could not get in touch with tech support. Received it and returned it within the same day.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Cowperthwaite

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hassle... for that kind of money, there’s more options!
customer_reviews.text: The sound app and whole house connection was a mess. Get with the program Bose!
customer_reviews.author: Legend

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best sounder
customer_reviews.text: The Soundbar 700 is easy to install. During setup, make sure you sit in different positions of the room. The effect will be fantastic. You'll be able to hear the slightly sounds to left or right of you. Probably the best soundbar out there.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ivan N. Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great sound as always!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Remote can be a bit clunky with some TVs... most buttons work but not all sadly. Sound quality is amazing, don’t necessarily need the sub.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Silver

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound system.
customer_reviews.text: The Bose 700 Soundbar arrived in new condition. Loved it and the sound I am hearing from it. Took only 30 minutes to set up and all is running well.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Amazed by it!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding sound, great look, great connectivity... really amazed by it!
customer_reviews.author: Frank E. Calero

customer_reviews.title: Can't Stop Bose Sound...but
customer_reviews.text: Bose has quality sound I could not set up the Sound bar to all it's functionality while attached to TV. Had to visit off site website to figure out how to setup properly
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Longtime Bose fan is still a fan
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use with our new 4K TV. It was easy to set up and easy to use. Sounds good and I can use the app from my phone to make music and podcasts play on it when I am not watching shows.
customer_reviews.author: PA

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Product
customer_reviews.text: Could not get the unit to integrate with my TV. Got absolutely no help resolving the problem.
customer_reviews.author: David Freedman

customer_reviews.title: Bose
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and easy to add bass module and surround speakers.
customer_reviews.author: GAT II

customer_reviews.title: Set up is a pain
customer_reviews.text: It’s. It easy to set up and for the price not worth the money. Get the cheaper model.
customer_reviews.author: brett meyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and clear sound quality
customer_reviews.text: An excellent product with superb sound quality. Easy setup with the app but had difficulty with the remote working with DIRECTV.
customer_reviews.author: Bob R

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sounds
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sounds when watch movies. The speaker surprise me anytime i watch movies, highly recommend with Bose Subwoofer 700 and around speaker 700.
customer_reviews.author: Huy ta

customer_reviews.title: Sounds So Clear, Like Rain Drops Dripping In Every Part Of The Ceiling.
customer_reviews.text: Sounds So Clear, Like Rain Drops Dripping In Every Part Of The Ceiling. Sound Bounces Every Part Of The Room. I am A Audiophile.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but worth it for a single sound bar
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Thought I might need to shell the extra $ for the sub but after setting it up I don’t think I’ll need it.
customer_reviews.author: Deac1

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Download the app and set it up for your room. It will not disappoint
customer_reviews.author: Money Saver

customer_reviews.text: I'm not too impressed with the sound quality. It's not like it's bad but it will not blow your mind. However, I really like the design, the finish of the white color. It doesn't stand out too much on a white TV stand, which is exactly what I wanted.

product_meta.title: Bose Soundbar 700 with Alexa Voice Control Built-in, Black
product_meta.description:
Style:Soundbar| Color:Black

Featuring an unmatched combination of sophisticated design and exceptional sound the Bose sound bar 700 brings the full power of all your entertainment to life. Customized drivers pump out clear, spacious sound and rich bass that breathe new life into everything from aliens invasions and car chases to house-rocking playlists. Plus, adapt audio room calibration optimizes the sound bar's acoustic performance to the unique characteristics of your room - giving you the best possible listening experience. Plus, a tempered Glass top, wraparound metal grille, and clean lines, make the sound bar look as good as it sounds. With built-in voice assistants, like Alexa and the Google assistant, you can control your music, get information, access smart home control, and more — hands free. Just behind the grille is a custom-designed eight-microphone array for superior voice pickup, so your voice assistant will still hear you, even when the music is playing loud. Use the Bose music app to control all of your music and the Bose sound bar universal remote to manage all of your entertainment. Plus, with Bluetooth, Wi-Fi and Apple airplay 2 compatibility, you can play What you want, wherever you want, from any device in your home. The Bose Sound bar 700 is part of a family of Bose smart speakers and sound bars designed to be compatible with each other so you can enjoy more music in more rooms. And when you want to dial up the performance of your sound bar, just add the optional Bose bass Module 700 and Bose Surround Speakers at any time for thunderous bass and full-on surround sound. Leave the sound bar on the TV stand or mount it on the wall using the optional Bose sound bar Wall bracket. Included: Bose sound bar 700, Bose sound bar Universal remote, batteries, power cord, HDMI cable and optical cable are included with purchase. Available in Black or white.

INPUTS AND OUTPUTS
 * HDMI output with Audio Return Channel (ARC)
 * Enhanced Audio Return Channel (eARC)
 * Consumer Electronics Control (CEC)
 * Optical TOSLink
 * Power input
 * USB input
feature_bullets: The best performing sound bar from Bose, featuring an unmatched combination of sophisticated design and exceptional sound
Built in voice assistants, like Alexa and the Google Assistant, with superior voice pickup from a noise rejecting eight microphone Array. Supported audio format- Dolby Digital, DTS
With Wi Fi, Bluetooth, and Apple airplay 2 compatibility, you can wirelessly stream whatever you want, however you want
Control comes easy, with three different ways to manage what you hear: voice, the Bose music app, or the context sensitive universal remote
The Bose music app makes setup simple. Leave the sound bar on the TV stand or mount it on the wall with the optional Bose sound bar Wall bracket
Add the optional Bose bass Module and Bose Surround Speakers to feel the impact of thunderous bass and full on surround sound
Bose SimpleSync technology allows you to pair your Bose Soundbar 500 or 700 with Bose Noise Cancelling Headphones 700 for a personal listening experience
Play integrated Wi Fi music services like Spotify, music and audible or use a Bluetooth connection to play anything from your phone or tablet
